translations.chinese: 卒不許羽，而遣沛公西收陳王、項梁散卒。
translations.english: In the end they did not permit Xiang Yu, but sent Pei Gong west to gather the scattered troops of King Chen and Xiang Liang.

translations.chinese: 乃道碭至 陽城與杠里，攻秦軍壁，破其二軍。
translations.english: So he went by way of Dang to Yangcheng and Gangli, attacked Qin army fortifications, and broke two of their armies.

translations.chinese: 秦三年十月，齊將田都畔田榮，將兵助項羽救趙。
translations.english: In the tenth month of the third year of Qin, Qi general Tian Du rebelled against Tian Rong and led troops to help Xiang Yu rescue Zhao.

translations.chinese: 沛公攻破東郡尉於成武。
translations.english: Pei Gong attacked and defeated the Dongjun prefect at Chengwu.

translations.chinese: 十一月，項羽殺宋義，并其兵 渡河，自立為上將軍，諸將黥布等皆屬。
translations.english: In the eleventh month, Xiang Yu killed Song Yi and took his troops, crossed the river, and established himself as supreme commander. Generals like Ying Bu and others all came under his command.
